page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content: Transport to places of work is predominantly by car.Some poeple travel to nearby railway stations such as Kidsgrove and Sandbach to catch connections for Inter-City services. In Rode Heath there are regular bus services to the Potteries and Sandbach.In Scholar Green the services run to the Potteries and Congleton. The A34 runs through Scholar Green connecting the Potteries to Congleton. Rode Heath however is on the junction of the A5011 Knutsford Potteries road and the A533 which runs to Sandbach. Both villages are within easy access of the M6 motorway.
